member.name: T:Db4objects.Db4o.Cluster.Cluster
member.summary: allows running Queries against multiple ObjectContainers.
member.remarks: allows running Queries against multiple ObjectContainers.

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Cluster.Cluster.#ctor(Db4objects.Db4o.IObjectContainer[])
member.summary: use this constructor to create a Cluster and call add() to add ObjectContainers

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Cluster.Cluster.Query
member.summary: starts a query against all ObjectContainers in this Cluster.
member.remarks: starts a query against all ObjectContainers in this Cluster.
member.returns: the Query

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Cluster.Cluster.ObjectContainerFor(System.Object)
member.summary: returns the ObjectContainer in this cluster where the passed object is stored or null, if the object is not stored to any ObjectContainer in this cluster
member.returns: the ObjectContainer

member.name: T:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.ClassUsageStats
member.summary: Statistics for the byte usage for a single class (instances, indices, etc.) in a db4o database file.
member.remarks: Statistics for the byte usage for a single class (instances, indices, etc.) in a db4o database file.

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.ClassUsageStats.ClassName
member.returns: the name of the persistent class

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.ClassUsageStats.SlotUsage
member.returns: number of bytes used slots containing the actual class instances

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.ClassUsageStats.ClassIndexUsage
member.returns: number of bytes used for the index of class instances

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.ClassUsageStats.FieldIndexUsage
member.returns: number of bytes used for field indexes, if any

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.ClassUsageStats.MiscUsage
member.returns:
number of bytes used for features that are specific to this class (ex.: the BTree encapsulated within a Db4objects.Db4o.Internal.Collections.BigSet<E>
instance)

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.ClassUsageStats.NumInstances
member.returns: number of persistent instances of this class

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.ClassUsageStats.TotalUsage
member.returns: aggregated byte usage for this persistent class

member.name: T:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.FileUsageStats
member.summary: Byte usage statistics for a db4o database file

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.FileUsageStats.FileHeader
member.returns: bytes used by the db4o file header (static and variable parts)

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.FileUsageStats.Freespace
member.returns: total number of bytes registered as freespace, available for reuse

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.FileUsageStats.IdSystem
member.returns: bytes used by the id system indices

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.FileUsageStats.ClassMetadata
member.returns: number of bytes used for class metadata (class metadata repository and schema definitions)

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.FileUsageStats.FreespaceUsage
member.returns: number of bytes used for the bookkeeping of the freespace system itself

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.FileUsageStats.UuidUsage
member.returns: number of bytes used for the uuid index

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.FileUsageStats.CommitTimestampUsage
member.returns: number of bytes used for the commit timestamp indexes

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.FileUsageStats.FileSize
member.returns: total file size in bytes

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.FileUsageStats.TotalUsage
member.returns: number of bytes used aggregated from all categories - should always be equal to FileSize()

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.FileUsageStats.ClassUsageStats
member.returns: the statistics for each persisted class

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.FileUsageStats.ClassStats(System.String)
member.returns: the statistics for the class with the given name

member.name: T:Db4objects.Db4o.Filestats.FileUsageStatsCollector
member.summary: Collects database file usage statistics and prints them to the console.
member.remarks: Collects database file usage statistics and prints them to the console.

member.name: T:Db4objects.Db4o.IO.SaveAsStorage
member.summary: Storage that allows to save an open database file as another file while keeping the reference system in place.
member.remarks: Storage that allows to save an open database file as another file while keeping the reference system in place. If anything goes wrong during copying the storage tries to reopen the original file, so commit operations can still take place against the original file.

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.IO.SaveAsStorage.SaveAs(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: call this method to save the content of a currently open ObjectContainer session to a new file location.
member.remarks: call this method to save the content of a currently open ObjectContainer session to a new file location. Invocation will close the old file without a commit, keep the reference system in place and connect it to the file in the new location. If anything goes wrong during the copying operation or while opening it will be attempted to reopen the old file. In this case a Db4oException will be thrown.
member.param: the path to the old open database file
the path to the new database file

member.name: T:Db4objects.Db4o.IO.SaveAsStorage.SaveAsBin
member.summary: We could have nicely used BinDecorator here, but BinDecorator doesn't allow exchanging the Bin.
member.remarks: We could have nicely used BinDecorator here, but BinDecorator doesn't allow exchanging the Bin. To be compatible with released versions we do

member.name: T:Db4objects.Db4o.Monitoring.MonitoredStorage
member.summary: Publishes performance counters for bytes read and written.

member.name: T:Db4objects.Db4o.Reflect.Self.SelfReflectionRegistry
member.summary: Contains the application-specific reflection information (that would be generated by a bytecode enhancer), as opposed to the 'generic' functionality contained in SelfReflector.
member.remarks: Contains the application-specific reflection information (that would be generated by a bytecode enhancer), as opposed to the 'generic' functionality contained in SelfReflector.

member.name: T:Db4objects.Db4o.Tools.Statistics
member.summary: prints statistics about a database file to System.out.
member.remarks:
prints statistics about a database file to System.out.
Pass the database file path as an argument.
This class is not part of db4o.jar!
It is delivered as sourcecode in the path ../com/db4o/tools/

member.name: M:Db4objects.Db4o.Tools.Statistics.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: the main method that runs the statistics.
member.remarks: the main method that runs the statistics.
member.param: a String array of length 1, with the name of the database file as element 0.
